titleStmt.title: A collection of papers relating to the present juncture of affairs in England
titleStmt.author: Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.

notesStmt.note: First ed. lacks collective t.p.; title from t.p of first pt. Cf. NUC pre-1956 imprints, Wing.
Editorship ascribed to Bishop Burnet. Cf. Lowndes.
Each part has special t.p. and separate paging, with pts. 1-5 dated 1688 and pts. 6-12 dated 1689. Pts. 3-12 have imprint: London : Printed, and are to be sold by Richard Janeway ...
Parts that were sold separately are cataloged separately. Cf. Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the Huntington Library.
